agua.rationale: Foundation for geometric computing - fully open source

pct.rationale: Workflow and lifecycle management - essential for orchestration

sdl.rationale: Basic semantic indexing and search - core functionality

hvs-nvm.rationale: Core runtime substrate - fully open source

mom.rationale: CRITICAL: Core to model orchestration - must be open for autonomous agent development and local execution

haw.rationale: CRITICAL: Core to human-AI interaction - must be open for community development and local use

ascif.full_name: Adaptive Safety Cognition and Intelligence Framework
ascif.rationale: CRITICAL: Ethics and safety must be open source - transparency essential for trust and community oversight

mxfy.rationale: CRITICAL: Intent analysis and synthesis core to autonomous operation - must be open for smaller model development
